annotation.message: An operand identifier reference is hiding another identifier of the same name.

a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTDTPPregnant4Logic (IMMZ.D2.DT.DTP.Pregnancy starting with 4 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Diphtheria and tetanus vaccination schedule in pregnant women who received 4 childhood DTP doses * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTDTPPregnant4Logic

def.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines")

a:s.a:s: "Three DTP primary series doses were administered"
"One tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered"

operand.name: Three DTP primary series doses were administered
One tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered
Client is currently pregnant

def.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines")

a:s.a:s: "Three DTP primary series doses were administered"
"Two tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered"
"The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago"

operand.name: Three DTP primary series doses were administered
Two tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered
The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago

def.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines")

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1"
"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"

operand.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1
Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2

def.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as three DTP primary series doses and one tetanus and diphtheria booster dose were administered and client is currently pregnant. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1"

'Should vaccinate client with second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as three DTP primary series doses and one tetanus and diphtheria booster dose were administered and client is currently pregnant. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client with second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as three DTP primary series doses and one tetanus and diphtheria booster dose were administered and client is currently pregnant. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2

then.value: Should vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for contraindications.

def.name: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines")

a:s.a:s: "Three DTP primary series doses were administered"
"Two tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered"
"The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered less than 1 year ago"

operand.name: Three DTP primary series doses were administered
Two tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered
The latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered less than 1 year ago

def.name: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and booster dose was administered less than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.

a:s.a:s: 'Should not vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and booster dose was administered less than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.'

expression.value: Should not vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and booster dose was administered less than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.

def.name: Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" (where "Vaccine type" = "Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines")

a:s.a:s: "Three DTP primary series doses were administered"
"Three tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered"

operand.name: Three DTP primary series doses were administered
Three tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered

def.name: Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.value: Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses and three tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: 'Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses and three tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'

expression.value: Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses and three tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:t.name: test
a:t.value: Test expected results based on example patients

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1"

'Should vaccinate client with second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as three DTP primary series doses and one tetanus and diphtheria booster dose were administered and client is currently pregnant. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose"

'Should not vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and booster dose was administered less than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.'
"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 1 year ago. This dose should be administered at least 1 year after second booster dose or during next pregnancy. Check for contraindications.'
"Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete"
'Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses and three tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
